transcript:
and have only one twenty-five-ruble note. I am in such a state. . . . My only hope now is in Count Cyril Vladimirovich Beziikhov. If he will not assist his godson you know he is Bory's godfather and allow him something for his maintenance, all my trouble will have been thrown away. ... I shall not be able to equip him." 
The countess' eyes filled with tears and she pondered in silence. 
"I often think, though, perhaps it's a sin," said the princess, "that here lives Count Cyril Vladfmirovith B
